sources.title: The Gorilla
sources.description: Upon receiving a death threat from the "Gorilla", a killer infamous for a string of murders, insurance broker Walter Stevens employs detectives Garrity, Harrigan and Mulligan for protection. The detectives arrive at Stevens' mansion that night, and proceed to explore the house and grounds, and question servants. All to no avail, because as the clock strikes midnight Stevens disappears. Stars: The Ritz Brothers, Anita Louise, Patsy Kelly, Lionel Atwill, Bela Lugosi, Joseph Calleia, Edward Norris, and Wally Vernon IMDb Page The 646MB MPEG4 was derived from the 2.9GB MPEG2 on this page . A better copy can be found here .

The detectives arrive at Stevens' mansion that night, and proceed to explore the house and grounds, and question servants. All to no avail, because as the clock strikes midnight Stevens disappears. Stars: The Ritz Brothers, Anita Louise, Patsy Kelly, Lionel Atwill, Bela Lugosi, Joseph Calleia, Edward Norris, and Wally Vernon This copy doesn't show the short, repeating scene that occurs shortly after 37 minutes seen in this copy and this one . sources.title: The Gorilla (1939)
sources.description: When an escaped circus gorilla appears to have gone on a murderous rampage, a threatened attorney calls on the detective trio of Garrity, Harrigan and Mullivan to act as bodyguards.  In short order, we discover that there is more to the attorney than meets the eye, and the ape may be innocent after all.  When a pretty young heiress faces peril, it's up to our heroic trio to save the day. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/the-gorilla-1939/

sources.title: The Gorilla (1939) [Colorized, 4K, 60FPS]
sources.description: The Gorilla is a 1939 black and white movie film which has been colorised, upscaled to 4K, and frames per second boosted to 60 FPS in 2021 using Artificial Intelligence (A.I) and Google Colab @  https://colab.research.google.com   Technologies used: A.I. Colorizing:  https://github.com/jantic/DeOldify  A.I. Increasing frame rate 60 FPS:  https://rife-vfi.github.io   A.I. Upscaling to 4K:  https://ffmpeg.org   GPU: Google Colab. This movie is in public domain category and it is Copyright free.

sources.title: Gorilla, The
sources.description: The three Ritz Brothers are fumbling detectives prowling an old dark house haunted by Bela Lugosi, an insane murderer and a giant gorilla.

sources.title: The Gorilla (1939) THE RITZ BROTHERS
sources.description:
Stars: Ritz Brothers, Bela Lugosi, Lionel Atwill
Director: Allan Dwan

When a wealthy man is threatened by a killer known as The Gorilla, he hires the Ritz Brothers to investigate. A real escaped gorilla shows up at the mansion just as the investigators arrive.

sources.title: The Gorilla (1939) Ritz Brothers - Comedy, Horror Full Length Film
sources.description:
When a wealthy man is threatened by a killer known as The Gorilla, he hires the Ritz Brothers to investigate. A real escaped gorilla shows up at the mansion just as the investigators arrive.

Director: Allan Dwan
Writers: Ralph Spence, Rian James
Stars: The Ritz Brothers (Jimmy, Harry, Al ) Anita Louise, Patsy Kelly, Lionel Atwill, & Bela Lugosi.
Genres: Classics, Comedy, Horror

sources.title: The Gorilla 720p 1939
sources.description: When a wealthy man (Lionel Atwill) is threatened by a killer known as The Gorilla, he hires the Ritz Brothers to investigate. A real escaped gorilla shows up at the mansion just as the investigators arrive. Patsy Kelly portrays a newly hired maid who wants to quit because the butler, played by Bela Lugosi, scares her. - Wikipedia 720p version
